description: 子代理命令 - /focus 聚焦操作

replacements.\"Usage: /focus <subagent-label|session-: "用法：/focus <子代理标签|会话键|会话ID|会话标签>"
replacements.\"⚠️ Discord thread bindings are unavail: "⚠️ 此账户的 Discord 线程绑定不可用。"
replacements.\"⚠️ Could not resolve a Discord channel: "⚠️ 无法为 /focus 解析 Discord 频道。"
replacements.\"⚠️ Failed to bind a Discord thread to: "⚠️ 将 Discord 线程绑定到目标会话失败。"
